meanings.definition: The larval form of certain crustaceans, typically having three pairs of appendages and a single eye.
meanings.sent1: The nauplii swam gracefully in the water, their tiny bodies shining in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study nauplii to learn more about the life cycle of crustaceans.
meanings.sent3: The nauplii decided to have a race to see who could reach the ocean floor first.
meanings.sent4: The nauplii danced in the ocean, their movements like delicate ballet performers.
meanings.sent5: As the nauplii hatched from their eggs, they embarked on a journey of growth and transformation.
